footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover what Ayahuasca is, its benefits, and how it can transform your life.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the team of spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and stay up to date with our ceremonies and events. Follow us on our social networks for inspiring content and updates.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our ceremonies, past and future, and find yours.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details to create a new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of this ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
resetCountersConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to reset the counters?
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This action will reset the views and reserve clicks for this ceremony to zero. This action cannot be undone.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be hidden from the main list, but not deleted.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to view the details of this ceremony.
guidesPageSubtitle: Dedicated and trustworthy individuals committed to your journey of healing and self-discovery. Each guide brings deep wisdom and a compassionate presence to support you every step of the way.
editGuideDescription: Modify the details for this guide.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a URL or upload an image file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have been successfully logged in.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We've sent you a verification email.
errorMinLength: The '{{field}}' field must be at least {{count}} characters long.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, a decoction of two plants: the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub. Together, they create a powerful tool for deep physical, emotional, and spiritual healing, opening the doors of perception and self-awareness.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca facilitates an expanded state of consciousness that allows access to the roots of our behavioral patterns, traumas, and emotional blockages. It acts as a mirror of the soul, showing us what we need to see to heal and grow, not always what we want to see. It is a process of purging and cleansing on all levels: physical, mental, and spiritual.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a spiritual teacher or a spirit of nature that teaches, guides, and protects. The ceremony is a sacred dialogue with this plant intelligence, where we receive visions, insights, and a deep sense of connection with all of existence.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a clear perspective on your life, relationships, and purpose. Many find answers to questions that have been with them for years.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and limiting emotional patterns. Ayahuasca helps you process and let go of burdens that no longer serve you, opening space for peace and joy.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep sense of unity with yourself, others, and the universe. This renewed connection can transform how you relate to the world.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing energy in a safe and contained space, where each participant's experience enriches everyone's journey. The power of the group amplifies the healing.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and fully personalized experience, designed to address your specific intentions. Receive the exclusive attention of our guides for a deep and transformative immersion.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is key to a deep and safe experience. Follow these guidelines to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: Our ceremony is a complete journey that ranges from preparation to integration, ensuring a transformative and sustained experience.
ceremonyProcessDescription: Guided by our experts, you will immerse yourself in a sacred space designed for introspection and deep healing.
experienceProcessDescription: Every journey is unique. We accompany you to navigate your visions and emotions with compassion and wisdom.
integrationProcessDescription: We offer you tools and support to incorporate the teachings of the ceremony into your daily life, ensuring lasting change.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet for at least 3-5 days before the ceremony purifies your body and sensitizes your spirit to receive the medicine.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Whole grains (rice, quinoa)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Water, herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat and pork
• Spicy or heavily seasoned food
• Fermented and processed foods
• Dairy and caffeine
• Sexual relations and alcohol
mentalPrepSubtitle: Prepare your mind and heart to open up to the experience with trust and surrender.
meditationDescription: Dedicate time to meditation and silence to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: What do you wish to heal or understand? Write down your intentions to give a clear direction to your journey.
reflectionDescription: Note your thoughts, dreams, and emotions before the ceremony to become aware of your current state.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring intense emotions to the surface. The key is not to resist. Allow yourself to feel, cry, laugh, and release. Every emotion is a step towards healing. Trust the medicine and our guides; you are in a safe space to explore and heal the depths of your being. Surrender is your greatest strength.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and focus during the experience.
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• Blanket and pillow or cushion
• Personal water bottle
essentialsList:
• Journal and pen to note insights
• Personal power object (optional)
• Open mind and heart
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is essential for a safe and profound experience. Discover our complete guide.
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this page.
mustBeLoggedInToViewCeremonies: You must be logged in to view the ceremonies.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Complete this questionnaire and follow the steps to prepare for your ceremony.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, supplements, or antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please detail which ones and the dosage.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: If yes, please describe your diagnosis and current status.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention or what do you hope to gain from this experience?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm looking for clarity in my career, to heal a relationship, to connect with my spirituality...
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in Ayahuasca ceremonies or other psychedelic medicines before?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience.
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save your answers. Please try again.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. You are ready to embark on this transformative journey. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: These are the answers you provided. If you need to make any changes, please contact the guides.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted your answers yet.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the site's content and settings.
themeCustomizationDescription: Adjust the application's color palette for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
allUsersDescription: View and manage all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to the health and preparation questions.
sendEmailDescription: Communicate important news or updates to all registered users.
editProfileDescription: Update your personal and contact information.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new inbox to verify the address.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your password to confirm.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
invitationTabDescription: Manage predefined messages for inviting users to complete the questionnaire via WhatsApp.
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose which message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
exportDataDescription: Create a full backup of all application data (users, ceremonies, content) into a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This will overwrite all current data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL current application data with the contents of the selected file. This action is irreversible. An automatic backup will be created before import.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can use it to undo the changes if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to revert the data to the previous backup? This will overwrite the current data.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been reverted to its previous state.
analyticsDescription: Visualize which sections of the website receive the most interaction.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will delete all click tracking data. This action is irreversible.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all user interactions with the AI spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Explore the complete chat history, sorted by date.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. I am here to answer your questions about Ayahuasca, ceremony preparation, and your path of growth. How can I help you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
errorLogsSubtitle: Monitor internal application errors for proactive maintenance.
systemLogsDescription: List of errors automatically captured by the system.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete this error log.
logDetailsDescription: Complete information about the captured error.
